name: Tatakai
description:
Face off in a fight to the death!

Player 1
W: Jump
A: Move Left
D: Move Right
Spacebar: AttackPlayer 2
Up Arrow: Jump
Left Arrow: Move Left
Right Arrow: Move Right
Mouse Click: Attack
